title: [bug] V2 Tauri custom titlebar unable to resize when decorations is false

labels.name: status: needs triage
labels.description: This issue needs to triage, applied to new issues

body:
### Describe the bug

I was trying v2 of tauri and I noticed that if you set decorations to false in the tauri.conf.json  the ability to resize the application is impossible even if you set resizable to true.

### Reproduction

1.  `npm create tauri-app@latest -- --alpha`
2.  add the demo titlebar to the project :
3.  make those configuration in the tauri.conf.json : 
```
{
  "build": {
    "beforeDevCommand": "yarn dev",
    "beforeBuildCommand": "yarn build",
    "devPath": "http://localhost:1420",
    "distDir": "../dist",
    "withGlobalTauri": true
  },
  
  "package": {
    "productName": "tauri-app",
    "version": "0.0.0"
  },
  "tauri": {
    "bundle": {
      "active": true,
      "targets": "all",
      "identifier": "com.tauri.dev",
      "icon": [
        "icons/32x32.png",
        "icons/128x128.png",
        "icons/128x128@2x.png",
        "icons/icon.icns",
        "icons/icon.ico"
      ]
    },
    "security": {
      "csp": null
    },
    
    "windows": [
      {
        "decorations": false,
        "fullscreen": false,
        "resizable": true,
        "title": "tauri-app",
        "width": 800,
        "height": 600
      }
    ]
  },
  "plugins": {
    "shell": {
      "open": true
    },
    "allowlist":{
      "all": true,
      "window": {
        "center": false,
        "close": true,
        "create": false,
        "hide": false,
        "maximize": true,
        "minimize": true,
        "print": false,
        "requestUserAttention": false,
        "setAlwaysOnTop": false,
        "setCursorGrab": true,
        "setCursorIcon": true,
        "setCursorPosition": false,
        "setCursorVisible": false,
        "setDecorations": false,
        "setFocus": true,
        "setFullscreen": true,
        "setIcon": true,
        "setMaxSize": false,
        "setMinSize": false,
        "setPosition": false,
        "setResizable": true,
        "setSize": true,
        "setSkipTaskbar": false,
        "setTitle": true,
        "show": true,
        "startDragging": true,
        "unmaximize": true,
        "unminimize": true

      }
    }
  }
}
```


### Expected behavior

the application is able to be resize when decorations is set to false

_No response_

### Additional context

I have tested this on Linux and Windows  and the same bug happen and I am pretty sure it also the same thing on macOS
